name: Netshield
tag_list: managed-it-services, datacentre, it-consultancy, it-support, databackup-and-recovery, it-network, managed-it-support, it-outsourcing, it-helpdesk, proactive-it-services
overview:
Netshield specialises in the delivery of complete Managed IT Services.

Our service portfolio ranges from the provision of Fully Hosted and Managed Services, Network Support and Professional Services, Secure Back up and Recovery Services, through to Network Infrastructure services providing the Planning, Design and delivery of Network projects.

The company is a technology and service led company; Netshield seeks to consistently provide a high quality service while focusing on building a reputation of innovation and expertise in all areas, by delivering well implements and diligently managed IT services to businesses globally.

Netshield works with multi sector organisations in commerce, industry and education, across both the public and private sectors and in a range of markets and industries including manufacturing, marine and aerospace. It provides networking and IT expertise, skills management and support offerings across Enterprise Network environments.
